Package Controller

package Controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddAppointmentController
    This AddAppointmentController Class is linked to the add-appointment.fxml file which controls the view users will use to fill in a form for adding an appointment to the database.
    AddCustomerController
    A controller class the implements some logic for the Add Cusotmer view where users can create a customer.
    AppointmentController
    Generic controller for adding and modifying appoinments
    AppointmentReportController
    This is the controller class for the appt-reports.fxml view.
    CustomerController
    Generic controller class for add customer and modify customer views
    CustomerReportController
    This is the controller class for the customer-report.fxml view.
    LoginController
    LoginController is the controller class linked to the login.fxml view.
    MainViewController
    Holds the main view.
    ModifyAppointmentController
    This ModifyAppointmentController Class is linked to the modify-appointment.fxml file which controls the view users will use to edit a form for modifying an appointment from the database.
    ModifyCustomerController
    Controller class attached to the modify-customer.fxml view.
